body:
Comment 1: 
This is specified in the spec:
http://golang.org/ref/spec#Type_switches

"The TypeSwitchGuard may include a short variable declaration. When that form is used,
the variable is declared at the beginning of the implicit block in each clause. In
clauses with a case listing exactly one type, the variable has that type; otherwise, the
variable has the type of the expression in the TypeSwitchGuard."
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
